artist: Author: Paul Chan , et al.; Publisher: Lumpen Magazine, Milwaukee, Chicago
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photographic image of figure holding a clove of garlic, with text, printed in color offset lithography on wove paper covers; 54 pp.
medium: Color offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: lumpen, no. 87: We Want To Live.
